Content.Text:
<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What am I doing? I'm trying to get an idea in my
head for the garden landscaping request I just
got.
<PAGE>
They don't want it looking like a sculpted
garden. It's supposed to be as close to natural-
looking as possible.
<PAGE>
I thought coming out here might give me some
inspiration.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
But I haven't really figured out what it is I want
to go with just yet.
<PAGE>
If all I need to do is prune and sculpt, that's one
thing. But trying to make something look
natural? That's hard.
<PAGE>
I've been thinking about it so much, I'm kind of
losing track of what "natural" really is.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, what kind of image do you get
when you think "natural"?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't overthink it. Just say whatever pops into
your head.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Though that could be hard if you're not used
to it, I guess. It isn't easy to take a mental image
and put it into words.
<PAGE>
Once you think you've got an idea, come tell me.
I'll be checking out some other areas to see what
I can come up with on my own. Later.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No, I think I get what you're trying to say.
<PAGE>
It's easier for me to get inspiration from
something spontaneous like that than from
some complicated analysis.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So...that's what you think, eh? Interesting.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I might just be able to work with
that!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. You've given me an idea
that should fit perfectly with what my client is
asking for.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...So! Now that I've got an image, I should head
back and start drawing up a blueprint.
<PAGE>
See ya.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, uh... That natural image you described for
me...
<PAGE>
I'm kind of thinking that's something only you
could've come up with, since you work with
nature on your farm all day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>No matter how hard I may have thought, I
wouldn't have ever come up with something like
that. So, uh...thanks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>I'm glad we ran into one another today!

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
A-anyway! That's all I wanted to say. Later.
